english_example_sentence: The little child should follow every word of his mother carefully.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребенок должен внимательно следовать каждому слову своей матери.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk annesinin her sözünü dikkatle takip ede.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Küçük çocuk annesinin her sözünü dikkatle ______.
